metadata.Name: NEREL
metadata.Description: Russian dataset for nested NER, RE, and event extraction from Wikinews.
metadata.Paper Title: NEREL: A Russian Dataset with Nested Named Entities, Relations and Events
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the International Conference Recent Advances in Natural Language Processing (RANLP 2021)
metadata.Venue Name: Recent Advances in Natural Language Processing
metadata.Abstract: In this paper, we present NEREL, a  Russian dataset for named entity recognition and relation extraction. NEREL is significantly larger than existing Russian datasets: to date it contains 56K annotated named entities and 39K annotated  relations. Its important difference from previous datasets is nannotation of nested named entities, as well as relations within nested entities and at the discourse level. NEREL can facilitate development of novel nmodels that can extract relations between nested named entities, as well as relations on both sentence and document levels.   nNEREL also contains the annotation of events involving named entities and their roles in the events. The NEREL collection is available via https://github.com/nerel-ds/NEREL.
